amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Global Threat Reduction Initiative by $27.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Global Threat Reduction Initiative by $27.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 195 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Andrews.
